root.name: Dogfight 1942
root.description: OverviewPlay a World War II pilot in this flight-simulator game from CITY Interactive and do historically realistic challenges or play dogfights against your friends. The game features 40 airplanes from Britain, USA, Japan and Germany that were airborne in 1942.DLCDogfight 1942 Fire Over Africa:Adds the Sands of Africa Campaigns to the game.Dogfight 1942 Russia Under Siege:Adds the Eastern Winds Campaigns to the game.PC System RequirementsOS: Win XP SP3 / Win Vista / Win 7Processor: Core2Duo 2.2GHz (E4500)Memory: 1024MB RAMHard Disk Space: 2.95 GBVideo Card: GeForce 8600GT 256MBDirectXÂ®: 9.0c
